MolCompass：识别化学预测模型薄弱环节的突破近年来，机器学习模型在化合物风险评估中变得越来越流行。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240821/MolCompass-A-breakthrough-in-identifying-weak-areas-of-chemical-prediction-models.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240821/MolCompass-A-breakthrough-in-identifying-weak-areas-of-chemical-prediction-models.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=925c54e7-6fd8-4538-99d4-b368825b5a10 Wed, 21 Aug 2024 12:48:00 -0400 MolCompass: A breakthrough in identifying weak areas of chemical prediction models
白血病细胞的生长和存活依赖于 P 体一个国际科学家团队发现了急性髓性白血病 (AML) 细胞维持生长的机制。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240821/Leukemia-cells-depend-on-P-bodies-for-growth-and-survival.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240821/Leukemia-cells-depend-on-P-bodies-for-growth-and-survival.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ec109245-0c4c-459a-bcc7-1c34dcaa2dfd Wed, 21 Aug 2024 11:10:13 -0400 Leukemia cells depend on P-bodies for growth and survival
调查显示，尽管存在隐私问题，美国人仍支持医疗保健领域的人工智能人工智能 (AI) 无处不在——从智能家居设备到娱乐和社交媒体算法。但人工智能在医疗保健领域好吗？俄亥俄州立大学韦克斯纳医学中心委托进行的一项新的全国调查发现，大多数美国人都相信这一点，但也有一些保留。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240821/Survey-shows-Americans-support-AI-in-healthcare-despite-privacy-concerns.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240821/Survey-shows-Americans-support-AI-in-healthcare-despite-privacy-concerns.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=093d5c58-1162-4194-9db3-f216a966dba1 Wed, 21 Aug 2024 10:58:26 -0400 Survey shows Americans support AI in healthcare despite privacy concerns
